title: So this 10 year announcement...
body:
LoL for mobile and consoles??

TFT for mobile??

LoL Fighting game??

OG URF IS BACK?!?!?!?!

Top and Bot map remake?????

Dragons are now... WTF?????

New FPS game??

A CARD GAME?????????????????????????????????

ANIME???


Am I high? Holy shit did not expect this.

Thoughts?
